H0.text: Which opera by Rossini , his last , is based on a play by Schiller . William Tell

H1.text: Which opera by Rossini , his last , is based on a play by Schiller . Semiramide

H2.text: Which opera by Rossini , his last , is based on a play by Schiller . The Barber of Seville

H3.text: Which opera by Rossini , his last , is based on a play by Schiller . Boo! Humbug

A4.text: The opera was Rossini's last, although he lived for nearly 40 more years.

A5.text: based on Friedrich Schiller's play Wilhelm Tell, which, in turn, drew on the William Tell legend.
